name: Wolf in the Den Jam build
name_original: Wolf in the Den Jam build
description:
Warning this is the jam build- if you want any future updates go on https://mjcox24.itch.io/wolf-in-the-den

My game for Brackey's 2021-1 Game Jam

In this Game you are the alpha of a pack of wolves

There is a hunter in the forest threatening the lifes of not only the wolves but the entire forest.

collect bunnies , convince more of your pack to help you and be Stronger Together to defeat the hunter
